title: Designing Social Problem-Solving Strategies Through STEM Problem-Based Learning (PBL)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic STEM concepts, leadership experience within organizations, and foundational knowledge of social issue analysis frameworks
context.additional_context: Course to address the lack of experience in solving real-world social problems from a STEM perspective for CSR project leaders

learning_goals: Integratively analyze real-world social issues across STEM disciplines (science, technology, engineering, mathematics)
Creatively design problem-solving solutions in environments with constraints (time, budget, resources)
Plan and operate learner-led collaborative projects using PBL methodology
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
